result.purpose: This folder contains mock implementations of various interfaces for testing purposes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on providing mock implementations for external services to facilitate testing.

mocks/infras/kafka_batch_consumer.go.purpose: This file defines a mock implementation of a Kafka batch consumer for testing purposes.

mocks/infras/skynet_client.go.purpose: This file defines a mock implementation of the SkynetClient interface for testing purposes.
